channel.title: I need an idea for a flash movie
channel.description:
What flash movie should I make for my final project of my animation class?
It's far from due, but I want to get a headstart so I can have the best one ;)
We have a choice: A 3d model, or a flash movie. I love both, but I have the advantage that I am pretty good with flash and flash actionscripting while the rest of the class hasn't even found out about flash yet. I want to make a flash movie that is like 10 minutes long, with decent graphics and animations. But I need some ideas. I have some good ideas, but they are runescape cheating/kaitnieks related, not sure if that's what I want for a final project worth 30% of our mark. I either want to make something corny and funny(like the movie "There she is") or something completly random and funny, or a parody of something.
Any ideas of a good one? I am not looking for storyline, just an idea.
edit* They can;t be too complex since I have to use flash6 at school :(

item.title: I need an idea for a flash movie
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

KyleGut3:

Flash 6 ?!!! NOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!
[hr]
Umm.. How about like a guy at school, who's entire life is both narrated and with Video Game music playing in the bg... and at the end he dies, with the pacman death sound?

Yeah my school is to cheap to update. Flash8 is much more powerful, and I'd use itexcept he's gonna need the project file for flash6, so I can't do it.

Hrm, ideas anyone?

Read full topic
item.source: I need an idea for a flash movie
